segments.text: I am reading the book on patent and I think it will be helpful for my work
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Patent ? Are you also learning something about patent ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yep ! I heard that your company is registering a new trademark .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are well-informed . Can you tell me something about the Patent Law in our country from the book you are reading ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I just read this in the whole afternoon . Let me show you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So coincidental . Actually we can exchange some information on this problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The purpose of the law is to protect and encourage inventions and to promote the development of science and technology . The law came into effect in 1984 , and it consists of 8 chapters with 69 articles .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is there any provision on applying for the patent for foreign company ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Foreign companies should appoint a patent agency , which is designated by our government to act as his patent agent . This task is usually taken by the Patent Agent Department .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long is the duration of patent right for an invention according to your Patent Law ?
segments.speaker: S1
